title: ReadMi
description: A fullstack application that utilizes MySql, Node.js, Express.js, and Handlebars.js to allow users to interact with a database of books.

title: Tech Blog
description: A fullstack application that utilizes MySql, Node.js, Express.js, and Handlebars.js to allow users to create an account and interact with others.

title: Recipe Radar
description: A frontend application that utilizes Node.js and a food API to allow users to search for recipes based on ingredients they have on hand.

title: Vinterview
description: A large full-stack MERN application that utilizes NoSQL, Mongoose, Apollo, GraphQL and React to allow users to filter job listings and initiate one-on-one conversations with employers.
